description: Comfortable, warm shirt in organic cotton flannel with light synthetic insulation. Great as an everyday mid-layer under your favourite G-1000 jacket, or as a shirt jacket in milder temperatures. Two chest pockets with buttoned flaps and discreet bellows plus hand pockets in the side seams. The collar can be turned up and fastened in place to protect against icy winds.
name: Fjallraven Ovik Lite Padded Shirt - Mens
